features: Weather protection: The outer jacket protects you from the elements with 20k/20k fabric; the DWR treated inner jacket provides water-repellent protection
Warm comfort: The outer jacket has plenty of stretch and a longer hip-covering fit; the insulated shirt offers breathable warmth with PrimaLoft® Black Eco 100g insulation
Versatile wear: Wear the inner jacket and outer shell together for skiing or separately for other mountain activities or in the city
Insulated synthetic, Water repellent treatment, Waterproof
